mapper.select: SELECT map.accounting_purchase_idx as accountingPurchaseIdx , u.name as name , c.company_type as companyType , ci.company_info_license_number as companyInfoLicenseNumber , i.inventory_type as inventoryType , map.company_contract_idx as companyContractIdx , map.accounting_purchase_date as accountingPurchaseDate , map.accounting_purchase_type as accountingPurchaseType , map.accounting_purchase_unit_price as accountingPurchaseUnitPrice , map.accounting_purchase_amount as accountingPurchaseAmount , map.accounting_purchase_payment as accountingPurchasePayment , map.accounting_purchase_sum as accountingPurchaseSum , map.accounting_purchase_code as accountingPurchaseCode FROM mushroom_accounting_purchase AS map INNER JOIN user AS u ON map.username = u.username INNER JOIN company_info AS ci ON map.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx INNER JOIN company AS c ON ci.company_idx = c.company_idx INNER JOIN inventory AS i ON map.inventory_idx = i.inventory_idx INNER JOIN company_contract AS cc ON map.company_contract_idx = cc.company_contract_idx;

/*재고물품 수량조회 */ SELECT inventory_idx as inventoryIdx , inventory_type as inventoryType FROM inventory
